titleStmt.title: The case of the City of London, in reference to their debts due by them to the orphans of the said City and others.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Samuel Roycroft, printer to the honourable City of London,

notesStmt.note: A request by the City of London for parliamentary assistance in paying the required orphans' portions.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
